summary: An ordinance providing for the compromise and settlement of certain special assessments levied against lots six (6) to twelve (12), inclusive, block three (3), and lots one (1) to four (4), inclusive, block two (2), Ballard Tide Lands, for the improvement of Sixth Avenue West, in the former city of Ballard, Local Improvement District No. 87, under Ordinance No. 675 of the former city of Ballard.
